sentences.english: When SSH jokes, he will turn hellos head and look for KTHsreaction.

sentences.english: In this context, porn is a safe haven for male sexual anxieties.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，不雅物是性焦慮男性的避風港。

sentences.english: So, everyone. Please don’t be blaming porn on your relationship problems.
sentences.chinese: 因此，廣大羣衆，請不要因爲感情問題而責怪不雅物。

sentences.english: His skis crossed and he sat down in a most undignified manner.
sentences.chinese: 交叉在一起坐下時，姿勢很不雅觀。

sentences.english: It's not nice to pick your nose.
Sarah: I haven't even been on a date.
sentences.chinese: 新婚姻法全文沒有和快女楊洋不雅照約會過。

sentences.english: It is unsightly and this can reflect on the efficiency of their work.
sentences.chinese: 這是非常不雅觀，同時這也反映出他們的工作效率。

sentences.english: Would photographs of a trip to the beach be considered inappropriate?
sentences.chinese: 在海邊旅行的照片會被認爲是不雅的嗎？

sentences.english: Whenever I talk in front of an audience, I got tongue-tied.
sentences.chinese: 一面對不雅衆講話，我就結結巴巴的。

sentences.english: Want this substantival purify with indelicate move.
sentences.chinese: 要把這着不雅的名詞去除。

sentences.english: What is the best way to see that district?
sentences.chinese: 不雅觀賞該地區最好的體例是什麼？

sentences.english: Her indecent photos are going around.
sentences.chinese: 她還有些不雅照在流傳。

sentences.english: Studies on the microeconomics and pricing of bancassurance products are sparse.
sentences.chinese: 微不雅觀經濟學研究的銀行保險產物和價格的稀疏。

sentences.english: All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 到工地的所有參不雅觀者必需帶上安全帽。

sentences.english: the one-eyed man obeyed the obedient audience's order.
sentences.chinese: 獨眼的人服從孝順的不雅衆的號令。

sentences.english: Subjective use-value is not susceptible of any kind of measurement.
